name: LEGO® City Undercover The Chase Begins
description: Step into the shoes of rookie cop Chase McCain and take him from zero to hero in LEGO® CITY Undercover: The Chase Begins, for Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo 3DS XL! Chase is the new boy in town and is out to impress his formidable boss, Commissioner Gleeson, head of the LEGO CITY Police Department. His first missions will see him hunting down hoodlums in his neighbourhood area, but it’s not long before he realises there’s more to the LEGO CITY crime underworld than meets the eye and embarks on an epic quest to bring justice to the whole city! So what are you waiting for? Dive into a hilarious blockbuster of a LEGO adventure and ensure our hero becomes a crime-busting legend!
